divs: Sighting Detailsi was outside my house when all of the sudden i look up and there i see it! there was a bee hive on a tree above me. but then right by it a shape appeared out of thin air. It was kind of like the ship on startrek how it jumps to hyperspace. Then it started performing wierd patterns and such. Meahwhile i was frozen with terror. then it erupted with fire and a very loud obnoxious scream noise. i fell down and said ," Lord almighty save the earth!" Then it charged at me and swooed up and disaperred.
Summary: Large, danced about the sky, loud noise, scary!
